_comment: AI self-reported token usage log. Written by AI at //start, //TOKENS, //COMPACT, and git push triggers.
_note: Gitignored by default (personal usage data). AI writes rough estimates — better than static 0%.

_schema.date: YYYY-MM-DD (local date, used as day boundary for reset detection)
_schema.tokens: integer (rough estimate ±30-50%, self-reported by AI; 0 for session-start markers)
_schema.timestamp: integer (Unix seconds — required for session boundary detection)

_session_logic.new_session: gap > 7200 seconds (2h) since last entry = new session boundary
_session_logic.context_refresh: gap < 7200 seconds = same session, //refresh only — no new log entry
_session_logic.daily_reset: date field changes = new day, all daily totals reset
